products.title: Storm™ 2420 Snow Blower
desc: 28 in. clearing width and a 20 in. intake height powers through up to 12" of snow
SelecTrac™ drive allows for good handling in hard-packed, icy snow or on gravel driveways
Heated hand grips help provide comfort in cold weather

products.title: Storm™ 2620 Snow Blower
desc: 26 in. clearing width and 20 in. intake height powers through up to 12" of snow
In-dash LED headlight helps provide visibility in low-light conditions
Delivers reliable power through a Troy-Bilt 243cc engine with push-button electric start

products.title: Storm 2890 Snow Blower
desc: 28 in. clearing width and a 20 in. intake height powers through up to 12" of snow
Touch N’ Turn™ trigger-controlled power steering allows you to quickly adjust your direction with one finger
Delivers reliable power through a Troy-Bilt 272cc OHV engine with push-button electric start

products.title: Storm™ 3090 Snow Blower
desc: 30 in. clearing width and a 20 in. intake height powers through up to 12" of snow
Powered by a Troy-Bilt 357cc OHV engine equipped with push-button electric start
Heated hand grips help provide comfort in cold weather
